title: "Contact Us"
subtitle: "Reach out to R/Pharma"
title-block-banner: "#EDF3F9"
title-block-banner-color: body
page-layout: full
---

```{=html}
<!-- Invisible iframe to absorb Google Form redirect -->
<iframe name="hidden_iframe" id="hidden_iframe" style="display:none;"></iframe>

<div class="mx-auto mt-4 p-3 border rounded shadow-sm" style="max-width: 600px;">
  <form 
    action="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdTM2EedwSq_wnNQeiKRjJpe2tcRqG5S1zG1DkZoMCBzePnug/formResponse" 
    method="POST" 
    target="hidden_iframe" 
    id="contact-form"
    class="contact-form">

    <div class="mb-3">
      <label for="name" class="form-label fw-bold">Name</label>
      <input type="text" name="entry.1617415932" id="name" class="form-control" placeholder="Your name" required>
    </div>

    <div class="mb-3">
      <label for="email" class="form-label fw-bold">Email</label>
      <input type="email" name="entry.930974599" id="email" class="form-control" placeholder="you@example.com" required>
    </div>

    <div class="mb-3">
      <label for="message" class="form-label fw-bold">Message</label>
      <textarea name="entry.1874483042" id="message" class="form-control" rows="5" placeholder="Your message" required></textarea>
    </div>

    <!-- Honeypot (hidden from humans) -->
    <div style="display:none;">
      <label for="honeypot">Leave this field blank</label>
      <input type="text" name="entry.262929223" id="honeypot" autocomplete="off" tabindex="-1">
    </div>

    <div class="text-center mt-4">
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-action-primary btn-action btn-lg px-4">Send Message</button>
    </div>

    <!-- Hidden inputs required by Google Forms -->
    <input type="hidden" name="fvv" value="1">
    <input type="hidden" name="draftResponse" value="[]">
    <input type="hidden" name="pageHistory" value="0">
    <input type="hidden" name="submit" value="Submit">
  </form>

  <!-- Submitting overlay -->
  <div id="submitting-overlay" class="text-center" style="display:none; padding: 2em;">
    <div class="spinner-border text-primary" role="status">
      <span class="visually-hidden">Submitting...</span>
    </div>
    <p class="mt-2 fw-bold">Submitting your message...</p>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
let submitted = false;
const form = document.getElementById('contact-form');
const overlay = document.getElementById('submitting-overlay');

form.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
  const honeypot = document.getElementById('honeypot');
  if (honeypot && honeypot.value.trim() !== '') {
    console.warn('Bot detected â€” blocking submission.');
    e.preventDefault();
    return false;
  }

  // Show submitting overlay and hide form
  form.style.display = 'none';
  overlay.style.display = 'block';
  submitted = true;
});

// Redirect handler for production after hidden iframe loads
document.getElementById('hidden_iframe').addEventListener('load', function() {
  if (submitted) {
    const base = window.location.origin + window.location.pathname.replace(/\/[^/]*$/, '/');
    window.location.href = base + 'thank-you.html';
  }
});
</script>

<style>
.contact-form input,
.contact-form textarea {
  padding: 0.75em;
  border: 1px solid var(--bs-border-color, #ccc);
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 1em;
  width: 100%;
}

#submitting-overlay {
  font-family: system-ui, sans-serif;
}
</style>
```
